extends AbstractStandardXComponent
implements OneDWorld

nextNormal

private double nextNormal(double mu,
                          double sigma,
                          double lowerBound,
                          double upperBound)
Returns a double strictly in [lowerBound .. upperBound) drawn from N(mu, sigma). Given bounds, suggest that: mu = (lowerBound+upperBound)/2 and sigma = (mu-lowerBound) / 3.

Parameters:
mu - the mu
sigma - the sigma
lowerBound - the lower bound
upperBound - the upper bound
Returns:
a double strictly in [lowerBound .. upperBound) drawn from N(mu, sigma)
